headline.print_headline: Clarification: Killings By Police-Law Schools Story
headline.main: Clarification: Killings By Police-Law Schools Story

lead_paragraph: In a story Dec. 9, The Associated Press reported that Columbia Law School officials had urged students protesting a lack of grand jury indictments of white police officers involved in the deaths of unarmed black men to remain focused on the serious issues the cases raise. The story should have made clear a Columbia Law School statement urged the public to remain focused on the issues.
